targets.query: SELECT 100-max("usage_idle") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

alert.message: your server is about to explode
alert.name: RAM alert

targets.query: SELECT 100-mean("available_percent") FROM "mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("reads"), 1s)+non_negative_derivative(mean("writes"), 1s)  FROM "diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s)-non_negative_derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s)  FROM "net" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "interface" fill(null)

alert.message: docker metrics are not being collected
alert.name: Docker metrics alert

targets.alias: this only exists so i can get a "no  data" alert when telegraf stops getting docker statss

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("io_serviced_recursive_total"), 1s)+non_negative_derivative(mean("io_service_recursive_total"), 1s)  FROM "docker_container_blkio" WHERE ("com.docker.compose.service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("rx_bytes"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(mean("tx_bytes"), 1s) FROM "docker_container_net" WHERE ("com.docker.compose.service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host", "com.docker.compose.service" fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("io_serviced_recursive_total"), 1s)+non_negative_derivative(mean("io_service_recursive_total"), 1s)  FROM "docker_container_blkio" WHERE ("com.docker.compose.service" =~ /^$service$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
